Protocols/VHCarrouselCollectionViewDeleg.name: VHCarrouselCollectionViewDelegate
Protocols/VHCarrouselCollectionViewDeleg.abstract: The methods adopted by the object you use to inform centered item in a collection view.

Classes/VHCarrouselCollectionView/Source.name: custom(_:)
Classes/VHCarrouselCollectionView/Source.abstract: Source will multiplied with custom value you entered

Classes/VHCarrouselCollectionView.html#/.name: carrouselDelegate
Classes/VHCarrouselCollectionView.html#/.abstract: The object that acts as the delegate of the collection view.

Classes/VHCarrouselCollectionView.html#/.name: dataSource
Classes/VHCarrouselCollectionView.html#/.abstract: The object that provides the data for the collection view.

Classes/VHCarrouselCollectionView.html#/.name: centeredSourceIndexPath
Classes/VHCarrouselCollectionView.html#/.abstract: Centered source indexPath. You can safely use this indexPath while you using for source operations.

Classes/VHCarrouselCollectionView.html#/.name: centeredIndexPath
Classes/VHCarrouselCollectionView.html#/.abstract: Centered indexPath which can be used for view operations. You should not use it for source operations

Classes/VHCarrouselCollectionView.html#/.name: sourceMultiplier
Classes/VHCarrouselCollectionView.html#/.abstract: Source multiplier logic

Classes/VHCarrouselCollectionView.html#/.name: init(frame:collectionViewLayout:)
Classes/VHCarrouselCollectionView.html#/.abstract: Creates a collection view object with the specified frame and layout.

Classes/VHCarrouselCollectionView.html#/.name: init(coder:)
Classes/VHCarrouselCollectionView.html#/.abstract: View init coder

Classes/VHCarrouselCollectionView.html#/.name: didMoveToWindow()
Classes/VHCarrouselCollectionView.html#/.abstract: Tells the view that its window object changed.

Classes/VHCarrouselCollectionView.html#/.name: layoutSubviews()
Classes/VHCarrouselCollectionView.html#/.abstract: Lays out subviews.

Classes/VHCarrouselCollectionView.html#/.name: reloadData()
Classes/VHCarrouselCollectionView.html#/.abstract: Reloads all of the data for the collection view.

Classes/VHCarrouselCollectionView.html#/.name: scrollToItem(at:at:animated:)
Classes/VHCarrouselCollectionView.html#/.abstract: Scrolls the collection view contents until the specified item is visible.

Classes/VHCarrouselCollectionView.html#/.name: scrollToSource(indexPath:animated:)
Classes/VHCarrouselCollectionView.html#/.abstract: Scrolls the collection view contents until the specified item

Classes/VHCarrouselCollectionView.html#/.name: scrollToNext(animated:)
Classes/VHCarrouselCollectionView.html#/.abstract: Scrolls to next item in view

Classes/VHCarrouselCollectionView.html#/.name: scrollToPrevious(animated:)
Classes/VHCarrouselCollectionView.html#/.abstract: Scrolls to previous item in view

Classes/VHCarrouselCollectionView.html#/.name: configureTimer(interval:animated:)
Classes/VHCarrouselCollectionView.html#/.abstract: Setup timer to scroll next item in view periodically

Classes/VHCarrouselCollectionView.html#/.name: enableTimer()
Classes/VHCarrouselCollectionView.html#/.abstract: Enables timer to scroll next item in view periodically.

Classes/VHCarrouselCollectionView.html#/.name: disableTimer()
Classes/VHCarrouselCollectionView.html#/.abstract: Disables timer to scroll next item in view periodically.

Classes/VHCarrouselCollectionView.html#/.name: scrollViewWillBeginDragging()
Classes/VHCarrouselCollectionView.html#/.abstract: Should be called in UICollectionViewDelegate.scrollViewWillBeginDragging(...)

Classes/VHCarrouselCollectionView.html#/.name: scrollViewWillEndDragging(with:targetContentOffset:)
Classes/VHCarrouselCollectionView.html#/.abstract: Should be called in UICollectionViewDelegate.scrollViewWillEndDragging(...)

Classes/VHCarrouselCollectionView.html#/.name: scrollViewDidEndScrollingAnimation()
Classes/VHCarrouselCollectionView.html#/.abstract: Should be called in UICollectionViewDelegate.scrollViewDidEndScrollingAnimation(...)

Classes/VHCarrouselCollectionView.html#/.name: reloadData(scrollToInitial:)
Classes/VHCarrouselCollectionView.html#/.abstract: Reloads all of the data for the collection view.

Classes/VHCarrouselCollectionView.html.name: VHCarrouselCollectionView
Classes/VHCarrouselCollectionView.html.abstract: CarrouselCollectionView which multiplies source to make feel it is infinitely scrolls
